thread.title: U.K. to Review Visas Granted to Russian Millionaires

author: Jenny Gross
title: U.K. to Review Visas Granted to Russian Millionaires
text:
LONDONâ€”The U.K. will re-evaluate hundreds of visas granted to Russian millionaires under a program for wealthy foreign investors, a top official said Wednesday, as the government faces pressure to crack down on Russian money after the poisoning of an ex-double agent.

In the aftermath of the nerve-agent attack on Sergei Skripal and his daughter in the English city of Salisbury this month, the U.K. expelled 23 Russian diplomats and has pledged to freeze Russian state assets if they pose risks to the life or property of people... RELATED VIDEO Russia, a Poisoned Spy and a Global War of Words The deepening rift between Moscow and the West is raising tensions to levels not seen since the Cold War. Following a coordinated response by Western allies, scores of Russian diplomats and intelligence officers have been expelled. WSJ's Niki Blasina explains the escalating situation.
